articles.title: This year's Call of Duty is called Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Eurogamer.net
articles.content:
This autumn's Call of Duty game is called Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War, according to a leak backed up by Eurogamer's own sources.
Call of Duty leaker Okami posted a mocked-up box cover with the correct title on Twitter last night. It's fair to say this i… [+1370 chars]

articles.description: Yep, this stylus-toting phone is available for under $150 right now.
articles.content:
Boost
LGs Stylo series is right up there as one of the best options if youre looking for a stylus-toting phone on a budget, and the Stylo 6 has just launched on Boost Mobile.
